            case NEGATIVE:
            case BIT_NOT:

			case EQUALS_NULL:
			case GREATER:
			case GRE_EQU:

			case NOT:
			case LIKE:
			case ISNULL:
			case ISNOTNULL:
			 	return SQLTokenizer.BOOLEAN;
            default:
            	return getDataType(left, right);
        }
    }
